trans-unit.source: Specifies the format to which the content type of an incoming message is mapped.
trans-unit.target: 指定将传入消息内容类型映射到的格式。

trans-unit.source: This is an extensibility point in the programming model that is used by the Web message encoder to override how content types are mapped to formats.
trans-unit.target: 这是编程模型中的一个扩展点，Web 消息编码器使用它来重写将内容类型映射到格式的方式。

trans-unit.source: To implement this class, override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentTypeMapper.GetMessageFormatForContentType%28System.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要实现此类，请重写 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentTypeMapper.GetMessageFormatForContentType%28System.String%29> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentTypeMapper" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentTypeMapper" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The content type that indicates the MIME type of data to be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示要解释的数据为 MIME 类型的内容类型。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the message format used for a specified content type.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，返回用于指定内容类型的消息格式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentFormat" /> that specifies the format to which the message content type is mapped.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentFormat" />，指定将消息内容类型映射到的格式。

trans-unit.source: This is intended to be an extensibility mechanism that can be used to override how content types are mapped to Web content formats.
trans-unit.target: 这是一种扩展机制，可用来重写将内容类型映射到 Web 内容格式的方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if all incoming messages are processed as "raw binary data" without ever doing XML or JSON parsing, you could implement a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentTypeMapper> that always returned <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentFormat.Raw> regardless of the content type that was passed in.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果所有传入的消息处理作为"原始二进制数据"，而不进行 XML 或 JSON 分析，你可以实现<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentTypeMapper>始终返回<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentFormat.Raw>而不考虑传入的内容类型。
